text: @CashApp So many losing their jobs!my moms caregivers cannot risk coming into my home to care for her due to high risk of #Coronavirus, causing a bit of a hardship.I will not be able to work now..Need to take care of her...could use bit of ur help thru this crisis..if possible..$Anamac1 https://t.co/SM4qIp8RSF
